recipesJson.name: Dragon lady
recipesJson.author: Tootall
recipesJson.description: This is a mix i make for my wife hence the dragon lady name lol. I hope she doesn't have an all the flavors account to see her fruit mixes name lmao!ðŸ˜‚ðŸ˜‚ðŸ˜ˆ Anyway all jokes a side this is a delicious simple bright fruit mix. Its great on a shake but perfect after a 24 hour rest. Nothing mind blowing here just a delicois mix that's not overly complex and a great shake and Vape!!! I used .25% Flavorah sweetness feel free to use a sweetener of your choice. This is not a mix that requires sweetener to taste good so totally a personal preference.

reviews.text: It's hard for me to balance strawberry and kiwi exactly the way I want them to be in a recipe, and this comes pretty close to my ideal.  Bonus point for keeping it simple and delicious.
